ROOT:
SELECT TABL1.A [TABL1.A], TABL1.B [TABL1.B], TABL1.C [TABL1.C], TABL1.AX [TABL1.AX], TABL2.A [TABL2.A], TABL2.Y [TABL2.Y], TABL2.Z [TABL2.Z] FROM TABL1, TABL2
WHERE TABL1.AX=TABL2.A AND TABL1.[A] = @TABL1_AAND TABL1.[A] IS NULL AND TABL1.[B] = @TABL1_BAND TABL1.[B] IS NULL AND TABL1.[C] = @TABL1_CAND TABL1.[C] IS NULL AND TABL1.[AX] = @TABL1_AXAND TABL1.[AX] IS NULL AND TABL2.[A]= @TABL2_AAND TABL2.[A] IS NULL AND TABL2.[Y]= @TABL2_YAND TABL2.[Y] IS NULL AND TABL2.[Z] = @TABL2_ZAND TABL2.[Z] IS NULL
